member.name: T:DailyChores.Data.ConfigurationData
member.summary:
The DailyChores.Data.ConfigurationData class. Contains the string, which represents the required connection string to the database.
CONNECTION Connection String

remarks.para: This ConfigurationData class contains the connection requirements for the databse.
These operations can be performed on Chore type objects only.

member.name: F:DailyChores.Data.ConfigurationData.CONNECTION
member.summary: Gives us a conenction to the databse..
member.returns: Does not return anything in this case.

member.name: T:DailyChores.Data.DailyChoresDbContext
member.summary:
The DailyChores.Data.DailyChoresDbContext class. Initialises the DbContext that is used in the application and configures the connection to the sql server.
Constructor Initialises the DbContext

remarks.para: This ConfigurationData class contains the connection requirements for the databse.
These operations can be performed on Chore type objects only.
